rows.label: tlk42200121_06_msg0001
rows.name:
So many refugees from Acedia
have come to Torigo Base, mo!

rows.label: tlk42200121_06_msg0002
rows.name:
Popipii cannot just stand by and
watch this scene unfold, mo!

rows.label: tlk42200121_06_msg0003
rows.name:
Popipii will ask her mother
to provide the funds, mo!

rows.label: tlk42200121_06_msg0004
rows.name:
I think we can manage if we sell the many
works of Alrestian art in Popipii's house, mo!

rows.label: tlk42200121_06_msg0005
rows.name:
Oh, but the works related to Bahn-sama
might not sell for much... mo.
